org.datavec.api.transform.condition

Interface Condition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseColumnCondition, BooleanCondition, CategoricalColumnCondition, DoubleColumnCondition, IntegerColumnCondition, InvalidValueColumnCondition, LongColumnCondition, NullWritableColumnCondition, StringColumnCondition, StringRegexColumnCondition, TimeColumnCondition

    public interface Condition
extends java.io.Serializable
    The Condition interface defines a binary state that either holds/is satisfied for an example/sequence, or does not hold.
    Example: number greater than x, String is one of {X,Y,Z}, etc.
    Typical uses for conditions: filtering, conditional replacement, conditional reduction, etc
